column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////So to that end
column2: I want to thank you for not basing your entire dining experience with us on what happened at the host stand. I appreciate your candid and constructive review
column3: and your feedback will help us in the future. But above all
column4: I am grateful you gave us a try and liked what we have to offer. We appreciate your business
column5: and we look forward to serving you again soon.
